record.name: Men's Original Bootcut Jeans - Blue Denim
record.formattedName: Men's Original Bootcut Jeans - Blue Denim
record.description: Original Bootcut Jeans are made with our most durable, heavy-weight denim to ensure a comfortable ride. The wide bootleg opening easily fits your riding boots.

record.name: Men's Classic Bootcut Jeans - Washed Blue
record.formattedName: Men's Classic Bootcut Jeans - Washed Blue
record.description: Classic Bootcut Jeans are constructed with durable cotton denim and have traditional 5-pocket styling. The jeans are made with a modern finish that incorporates distressed detailing. The wide bootcut silhouette fits nicely over your riding boots.

record.name: Ultra M04 Half Helmet
record.description: For an open feel on the open road, consider the Ultra M04 Half Helmet. This design, like all half helmets, delivers minimal coverage and weight, but still passes tough DOT standards. Stay cool with the moisture-wicking liner and cut glare on a gorgeous sun-soaked day with the removable visor. Bold art inspired by classic tank colors and graphics gives this men's motorcycle half helmet icon style.

record.name: Wheeler M04 Half Helmet
record.description: Fit, style, and comfort. Have it all in our matte black Wheeler M04 Half Helmet. Designed with a removable visor to help combat sun glare, this motorcycle half helmet features an exclusive shell design you won't find anywhere but here. You'll love how the colorful flame artwork contrasts with the sleek matte black shell. Great look; huge value at an exceptional price point.

record.name: Pink Label M04 Half Helmet
record.description: The Pink Label M04 Half Helmet is for every free spirit, friend, or family member impacted by breast cancer. Expert details include tonal embroidery and a metal badge of the iconic pink ribbon on the earflaps. A bold black-white-pink color scheme coordinates with other Pink Label gear or your favorite black leather wardrobe. This design, like all half helmets, delivers minimal coverage and weight, but still passes tough DOT standards. Stay cool with the moisture-wicking liner and cut glare on a gorgeous sun-soaked day with the removable visor on this women's motorcycle half helmet. For every Pink Label product purchased, Harley-Davidson® will donate 3% of net sales to organizations who support and empower those facing breast cancer.

record.name: Women's Double Knit Four-Way Stretch Hoodie
record.formattedName: Women's Double Knit Four-Way Stretch Hoodie
record.description: Life on the road requires gear that moves with you. Which is why our Double Knit Four-Way Stretch Hoodie features incredible give in all ways to match your every bend, lean, and reach. Thoughtful details include three-panel hood to conform to your head (no hood peaks!), integrated cords (no wind-flapping strings!), and thumbholes on cuffs (no under-jacket sleeve bunching!) This women's hoodie is styled with low-key graphics to pair with other gear in your closet. Part of our Genuine MotorClothes® Collection and cut from four-way stretch 84% cotton; 11% polyester; 5% elastane double-knit jersey.

record.name: Women's Double Knit Four-Way Stretch Hoodie
record.formattedName: Women's Double Knit Four-Way Stretch Hoodie
record.description: Zip through your day in the versatile Double Knit Four-Way Stretch Hoodie. Cozy jersey moves in four directions to keep up with your every move. Rib-knit elbows panels on this women's hoodie offer excellent stretch and reach. Convenient features include the innovative tech-friendly media-cord zipper pull, bonus media pocket, extended cuffs, and a three-panel hood (for no awkward hood points.)

record.name: Men's Felt Embroidered Logo Cap
record.description: You know it when you see it—the classic Bar & Shield logo. A worldwide icon for free spirits to rally around. This version features a thick two-layer style embroidered on hearty felt that harkens back to early days of team sweaters with felt appliqué and patches. This men's baseball cap includes a slide closure for ideal fit. And for a modern touch, reflective trim in the sandwich bill.

record.name: Women's Bling Heart with Rose Gold Bar & Shield Dangle Earrings
record.formattedName: Women's Bling Heart with Rose Gold Bar & Shield Dangle Earrings
record.description: Jewelry in the Bling Heart Collection is hand-crafted with the highest attention to detail and quality, using only the finest materials available with rose gold accents and is beautifully adorned with Cubic Zirconia gemstones.
record.productOptions: productCode:99387-20VW|colorCode:|colorName:Silver|displayColorName:Women's Bling Heart with Rose Gold Bar & Shield Dangle Earrings|defaultColor:True|hex1:|hex2:|thumbnailImageUrl:/content/dam/h-d/images/product-images/merchandise/2020/winter/unisex/99387-20vw/99387-20vw_F.jpg|basePrice:180|basePriceFormatted:$180.00|additionalPrice:|additionalPriceFormatted:|additionalPriceMessage:|redirectUrl:/us/en/shop/womens-bling-heart-with-rose-gold-bar--shield-dangle-earrings/p/99387-20VW|averageRating:4.7|numberOfReviews:3

record.name: Men's Bradford Performance Boots
record.description: Get ready to try our most comfortable boot yet. Patented ShockAbsorber Twin Pad™ Comfort Technology cushions the foot and absorbs schock with each step for increased comfort - guaranteed. Try a pair for 30 days and if you're not completely satisfied that they're the most comfortable boots you’ve ever worn, send them back for a full refund. This boot also has reflective material purposefully placed on boots to imporve your changes of being seen in low visibiliy conditions on the road.

record.name: Men's Killian Mixed Media Gloves
record.description: The lightweight mixed-media design offers a comfortable, sure grip with perforations for venting coolness when things heat up. To work against grip fatigue, strategically placed power-stretch details increase mobility and dexterity on the Killian Mixed Media Gloves. And for a unified look, these men's motorcycle gloves coordinate with the men's Killian Riding Jacket.

record.name: Women's Killian Riding Jacket
record.description: When you're ready to get away from it all, you'll be glad you have the Killian Riding Jacket. It's an excellent three-seasons jacket thanks to the versatile lining system. Check your weather app then mix-and-match the warmth and waterproof liners to beat Mother Nature at her own game and log more miles. This women's textile motorcycle jacket has more to offer in terms of value, too, as the elbow and shoulder armor is already included (sewn in). There's more to mention, including extensive reflectivity, power-stretch features, stretch comfort panels—even cozy fleece-lined pockets. Read all about it in the bullets.

record.name: Dominion Derby Cover
record.description: Express your bold, renegade attitude. The complete Dominion™ Collection of engine covers lets you set your own styling direction.
record.superCategoryCodes: HD Product Types|Parts|Motorcycle Parts|Custom Accessories & Trim|Derby Covers

record.name: Boom! Audio Bluetooth Cruiser Amp and Speaker Kit
record.formattedName: Boom! Audio Bluetooth Cruiser Amp and Speaker Kit
record.description: The Boom!™ Audio Cruiser Amp and Speaker Kit provides amplified music through two great-sounding handlebar-mounted speakers. The bullet shaped enclosures house a 3.6” woofer and separate 1” tweeter that combine to deliver rich bass notes and sparkling highs. The waterproof speaker elements are protected behind stylish metal grills that are finished with a center-mounted trim ring. Powered by a self-contained 40 watt RMS amplifier, these speakers can cut through the background noise and deliver clear, crisp sound.
